metadata.title: RA Family: Unable to step into a non-secure callable program in a project using TrustZone®

sections.content:
Question:
I tried to step into a non-secure callable program in a non-secure project using ARM® TrustZone®, but I get a step-over (following a function call).
Answer:
In the transition between secure and non-secure, the compiler inserts code for TrustZone® and no debug information is generated in the inserted code.
As a result, step-in behavior may not work as intended.
Please try the countermeasures explained in the FAQ below.
Unable to step into function (e² studio) https://en-support.renesas.com/knowledgeBase/20424844
  Suitable Products
RA family devices with Trust Zone
